name: The Resistance Companion
description:
The Resistance Companion takes all the setup out of the amazing board game The Resistance and gets you right into the action!

It starts by selecting a random player to be the Leader. It then takes you step by step, guiding you through the setup so you don't miss any steps. Most importantly, it handles narrating the Spy Phase so you don't have to!

This app is universal and works for iPhone, iPad, and iPod.
